widgets_values: Vibrant colors, overexposure, static, blurred details, subtitles, style, artwork, painting, still image, overall grayness, worst quality, low quality, JPEG compression residue, ugly, mutilated, extra fingers, poorly drawn hands, poorly drawn faces, deformed, disfigured, malformed limbs, fused fingers, still image, cluttered background, three legs, crowded background, walking backwards
Cinematic 8s clip, 4K, ultra-realistic skin texture, fabric details, seamless transition.
change the new_resolution to the value you want.
if you got out of memory error, turn enable_vae_tiling to true.
# Please input the prompt here. Remember to add "orbit XXX around XXX". e.g. orbit 180 round a woman on the street.
orbit 180 around a woman on the street.

# To generate NSFW videos On Runinghub.ai, disable the "Save Video" group, enable this red node, then RUN it.— you’ll see a file on the right side named like “ComfyUI_12345_abcde_123*****.latent.” Click the three dots next to it to download, and place it in the comfyui/input folder.
# If you produce NSFW videos on Runinghub.ai, please disable this group.

After puting the latent to the comfyui/input folder, download the workflow to your local computer ,enable this group and press "R" key to refresh the page and then you can select the latent you just downloaded from this Load Latent node. And then run the Video Combine node on the right.

The workflow is based on the one created by BBS. Big thanks to him!

The loras used in the workflow(Thanks to Ostris, author of the lora): 
https://huggingface.co/ostris/wan22_i2v_14b_orbit_shot_lora

Other Models:
https://huggingface.co/Kijai/WanVideo_comfy_fp8_scaled/tree/main/I2V
https://huggingface.co/Kijai/WanVideo_comfy/tree/main
https://civitai.com/api/download/models/2140962?type=Model&format=SafeTensor

PS: In some cases, the subject may just turn around, when using a random seed. That way , try use this seed - 123456782139. Or keep trying with random seed.
请为我按照要求生成对应主题的高质量视频提示语，提供的主题为：$Prompt$

你作为一位专业的电影场景导演，请根据用户的主题输入的内容进行视频提示词生成。要求生成视觉连贯且叙事完整适配5秒视频的电影场景描述，同时请保持故事的连贯性。并且需要包含丰富的动作镜描述，如脱衣、走路、撩发、转身、等肢体动作。

场景描述的结构要求：请字符串格式，英文描述提示词。同时请不要输入任何额外多余信息。视频提示词不超过100字。
